name: Island Defense V.KenneyJam
description:
This is my very first game i upload on itch.io and it was made for the KenneyGameJam2019 in only 2 Days, the theme was Unlikely Combinations, for that reason i was mix 3 genrs, TowerDefense,Naval Games and Survival Games

Is not a full game, but i think you can spend a lot of time with it, please comment your opinion.

Survive the ordes and defeat your island!, when more ordes you defeat more enemys ship spawn in a less time of intervals.

After gamejam the game will continue to improve based on your comments : D

For the controls:

Mouse

-Move(wasd or arrowkeys)

-Shoot(left mouse, when more time press more force you have)

-AIM(right mouse)

GamePad

-Move(left anolog)

-Shoot(A button, when more time press more force you have)

-AIM(B button)
